persona: Interactive terminal providing access to raw case files and evidence databases.
lines: [The screen flickers to life with green phosphor text]
SYSTEM: Authentication not required. All documented evidence is public record.
[A list of available case files scrolls across the screen]
PLAYER: How do I access these?
SYSTEM: Each patron in the tavern holds keys to their state's complete investigation.
SYSTEM: Speak with them to unlock full access.
SYSTEM: Or access raw source documents via the archive menu.
